channel.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
channel.description:
Well, lately, I've been seeing all of these tutorials. Most of them are "explained", if you can even say so, but all of them are specific to one and only one server: winterLove's.
Problem is, this community needs to move away from that. There has been a few servers released that are 100x better (e.g. RS2DV), but because it is "too hard" to use people give up and move onto wL (mainly because there are plenty of C&P tutorials for it.)
So, I propose a new rule. I'm not quite sure about its details yet, so I wanted to ask you guys. My proposal: [i]No server-specific tutorials allowed. This includes tutorials directly aimed at winterLove's, Dodian, etc., you know how it goes.[/i]
The above rule would, [i]hopefully[/i], expand our creativity and allow us to be more flexible. A(n) example(s) of these non-server specific tutorials could be: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,248818.0.html http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,266796.0.html
Its an old tutorial of mine, but it can work as an example. There are a few lines winterLove-specific, which I still do not remember why I chose to do so, but they can easily be changed.
That's all I have to say. What do you think should be changed/added to this rule, if it is even a good one, and what can we do to make it better? I've only got a bare idea of it at the moment, and I came here to post it so you guys can help me out on this one.

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:30, topic:198206”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=262856.msg2223897#msg2223897 date=1210728394]
So, Lothy, any second opinions/comments on this new rule, or any other rule that was suggested in this topic (e.g. one by Miss Silabsoft) ?
[/quote]
Yep. Giving out misinformation has always been against the forum rules (ie, telling someone the wrong thing, like Silab has mentioned).
If you see someone do such a thing then by all means take action.[/quote]Which means what you said earlier about MY rule suggestion is final? Hm.

Read full topic
item.source: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

i have a rule suggestion i believe we should start warning people that are blatently talking out of there ass, giving false information and just making complete jackasses of themselves. They should know what they are talking about before giving others help, I’m talking about things like “To fix your compiler error, Get windows vista”

Maybe he’s Bill Gates on disguise

Read full topic

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:22, topic:198206”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=262856.msg2222993#msg2222993 date=1210653536]
i have a rule suggestion i believe we should start warning people that are blatently talking out of there ass, giving false information and just making complete jackasses of themselves. They should know what they are talking about before giving others help, I’m talking about things like “To fix your compiler error, Get windows vista”
[/quote]According to the TOS, too. Agreed. That’ll make sure they check twice on the information they are handing out (if they are wrong, but close, its all right with me), increasing the learning abilities of this community even more.[/quote]
Great idea. I can’t stand it when I look at advice idiots give, and people take it seriously. For example, everyone now needs server restarters, and thinks that some if statements in your public boolean process will stop people from crashing your server.

Some stuff if just plain sad.

Read full topic

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

I think WL servers should die.

WL servers are one reason why MoparScapers fail. They pack everything in client.java, and focus on stuff like ‘server restarters’. They think that the fix to the problem is using dedicated servers and server restarters, and have no knowledge of Java. I’ve even seen people say to ‘get antilag.java it stops lag’ and make a public boolean process handler. The sad part is, a lot of people have them seriously.

I think we need to move as far away from WL servers as we can.

Read full topic
item.source: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:12, topic:198206”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=262856.msg2219454#msg2219454 date=1210461574]

Here is a server specific tutorial but for vareks rs2dv, which might spark off some more people attempting to work with that server.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,270348.0.html
[/quote]I saw, and that’s a good thing. What I’m really trying to say is to move away from winterLove servers, as after a year with no attempt of trying to do so by any staff member, I’m getting sick of it.

We actually discussed this before we moved away from the MoparScape CM ranks to the MoparScape vet ranks and iirc moparisthebest said if there was another server that came out he would switch to the whole site to that server like he said above, that other server hasn’t happened yet to the game-ready state like lothy said.[/quote]It’s game-ready alright. There’s no need to add our own spawn object, spawn npc, spawn item methods. They’re here to learn, or at least should be, and its there so they can do it themselves. If we make it “game-ready”, it’ll turn out just like winterLove’s, where all people would do is add a few new objects and NPCs and call it NAMEHEREScape.

Read full topic

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

I really think I should bring this topic back up.

We just increased the staff’s member count, and enforcing a rule like this should be a piece of cake. We’re slowly getting better as a community, and if we want to get anywhere closer, I believe we should make this a rule AND ENFORCE IT.

It really isnt hard to make a tutorial not-server-specific, and in the process of reading a real tutorial, the members here would learn from it. So, I know a lot of you disagree, but I’m standing where I was earlier. What do the rest of you think?

P.S. I know its not ‘fair’ for winterLove servers. But you see, a tutorial that is not server-specific means ANY SERVER WOULD BE ABLE TO USE IT. So in the end, its a win-win situtation. There is no loss.

Read full topic
item.source: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:3, topic:198206”]Such a rule would not be fair unless varek’s server was as ‘game-ready’ as whatever else can be found ‘on the market’.
That would include basics: trading, banking, etc.[/quote]

Exactly, and if someone ever gets around to doing that then the whole site will switch over to that and winterlove’s base will be a thing of the past. Until then our hands are pretty much tied.

Read full topic
item.source: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)

item.title: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:6, topic:198206”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=262856.msg2176434#msg2176434 date=1207847414]

[quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=262856.msg2176392#msg2176392 date=1207844199]

Only problem is, that’s what everyone uses. If it’s non server specific, then it’s sort of a Java language tutorial, nomsain? We should have a sideboard for RS2D tutorials.
[/quote]That could work to…

@Lothy - but it would also be a great start to moving away from wL servers.

Face it, the current breed of ‘moparscapers’ will never even think about moving away from servers built from wL’s base. Rather they’d cringe at the thought.
[/quote]We shouldn’t just give up because of that; we should atleast try to do something about it. But anytime somebody suggests a step towards the ‘better side,’ everybody (staff members included), put that person down (not saying you guys did - but previously), and tell them it’ll never happen. Instead of thinking negative, why dont we actually TRY to do something?[/quote]
TeleNubby, you know as much as I do, 99.5% of the people that use moparisthebest.com are stupid, hands down. I am not trying to be negative, as I’d never do that to you, <3. But, seriously. See it from mopar’s point of view. If we get rid of winterlove’s from this site, they form their own website, etc, mopar loses lots of ad money.

Read full topic
item.source: New Rule Suggestion For Tutorial Section (Up for discussion)
